name: Funny Fish on the Nautilus
description:
The A.I. Nautulis awakes in the shell of a derelict submarine. A submarine beset by strange hostile sea-life. Awaken the old ship's systems from their slumber, and escape!

Every so often, you robotic frame will need to recharge. You will enter hibernation. While in hibernation, you are vulnerable to attacks from creatures of the deep. Use materials to build defenses to protect yourself. However, you will also need these materials to repair the submarine.


Controls

Movement = W A S D

Interact = Hold E

Restart = R

Place Turret = Mouse Click Turret you want to build, then mouse click where you want to build it. Right Click to cancel building.

To Win

- Repair the 3 Reactors!

- Each Reactor has 2 control panels that need to be repaired.
